3.title: Wakeboard Republic & Woody Cookie

1.title: ISA World Masters Surfing Championship
1.plot: We head to Ecuador to join the Isa world masters championship. The ISA World Championship features the world's best surfers over the age of 35. They compete in divisions like Men's Masters, for those over 35 years old; Men's Grand Masters, for those over 40 years old; Men's Kahunas, for those over 45 years old. This event brings the worlds best, past and present, together.

2.title: Swell Session & Powered Surfboard
2.plot: We head off on an action packed kite surf adventure following two of the sports most credited talents. We also take a look at some brand new technology. The powered surf board, promising to change the way in which individuals learn how to surf, for the better.

3.title: PWA costa brava, Fuerte & Skimboarding
3.plot: We follow the PWA windsurfing tour to Costa Brava & Fuerte and then finish off on the East cost of Australia for some impressive skim-boarding action.

4.title: ASP Multi Event
4.plot: This week on H20 we jump on the ASP world tour as they head to the Canary Islands, France and to the UK for some intense competition on the waves

5.title: Kill the Matador
5.plot: This week on H20 we premier The new film from Patrick Pearse - Kill The Matador. An exclusive insight into the punk culture around surfing, specifically through the life of pro surfer Otis Carey.

6.title: KTA Cook Islands & China
6.plot: We jump on the KTA tour this week as they head to the beautiful Cook Islands and onto the brilliant china. Hosting the very best in Kite Surfing we a pleased to showcase the worlds best talent and promising stars in the sport.

7.title: In Between Sport Film
7.plot: An insight into the world of Kim Feast, Body Boarding professional who has faced many challenges in pursuing the sport he loves. We join him on a worldwide tour to showcase some the best body boarding spots on the planet.

8.title: The Element - Behind the Scenes
8.plot: A group of Irish surfers put together a hilarious insight into making a successful and profitable surf film. A brilliant watch and a very funny story.

9.title: Uprising
9.plot: Kite surfing at its very best and at its most extreme. A brilliant short film that will leave you wanting to get you board and get out on the sea.

10.title: British Kite Surfing
10.plot: We showcase why the UK is one of the best kite surfing destinations on the planet. Strong winds and monster waves these conditions really push the athletes ability to the max this "next wave" of Action sports.

11.title: Windsurfing World Cup
11.plot: Highlights from this years PWA windsurfing world cup hosting event across the slalom and freestyle disciplines for youth and professional surfers.

12.title: H2x Jet ski, Sould Reversal & Miragem
12.plot: Highlights from this years H2X indoor water cross event. The H2X Watersports thrill shows are events that will feature the world's top professional Jet Ski freestyle riders, Wakeboarders, and Waterskiers. We then show case 2 brilliant surf films looking some extremely talented surfers in the world's best surf sports.

13.title: PWA windsurfing freestyle world cup at the Dam7 Festival.
13.plot: DAM7 is the festival centered around the Freestyle Windsurfing World Cup in the Netherlands. Everything revolves around board sports here; music, creativity and ultimate fun. Think of action, relaxation, fun, party and beach. In short, the lifestyle that goes with board sports! We see sailors battle it out across 3 main events in both men and woman divisions. This season finale is not to be missed.

imdb.plot outline: Wild Spirits H2O' offers the very best extreme water action. Featuring highlights from the most extreme and wettest sporting events in the world, including surfing, wakeboarding, kite and windsurfing, 'Wild Spirits H2O' features rider profiles, interviews, highlights, and all things water based!
imdb.title: Wild Spirits H2O
plot: _Wild Spirits H2O_ (qv)' offers the very best extreme water action.
